Line13.6D03F: When I knew him, he was searching for purpose. I couldn’t give him one, and so he found it in Lilith.
Line15.6D03F: I didn’t stop him. I let him become...this.
Line19.BAE4: Now is our chance to make it right... before things get even worse.
Line21.6D03F: Yes. We have what we need. The summoning will take place at the Temple of the Primes in Mt. Civo.
Line23.6D03F: Now to find a way out. Knowing Elias, he would’ve had an escape route in case things didn’t go his way.
Line3.6D03F: Andariel, chained to the heart of Guulrahn. Her evil will not stay contained here, it will drown the land in suffering.
Line9.6D03F: Quite the opposite. Elias’s mind is clear, for once.
VoiceDir23.6D03F: Urgent, but the first line is more to himself, considering. Shortly after this moment, Lorath will look around and find a hidden exit behind a bookcase (he does it, not the player)
